translations: adj.宽宏大量的；有雅量的；宽大的

phrs.translation: 宽宏大量的, 有雅量的, 肚量, 坦荡
品德高尚的, 宽宏大量的
宽容不与人计较的态度

sentences.sentence: I was prepared to be magnanimous, prepared to feel compassion for him.
sentences.translation: 我准备好了要宽宏大量，也准备好了同情他。

sentences.sentence: He was magnanimous in defeat and praised his opponent's skill.
sentences.translation: 他对失败表现得很洒脱，并且赞扬了对手的才能。

sentences.sentence: I hope you will be magnanimous enough to excuse any incorrect behaviour on my part.
sentences.translation: 对不住的地方，望您海量包涵。
